channel.title: Gold after winning and leaving
channel.description:
Can we get our gold sent to us in the mail after leaving a game that you ultimately win. At the very least offer a seriously better reward for sticking around. This could be more gold than if you left by like 100% or something BUT then you have to make the gold not pointless too. As it stands now cosmetic don't mean shit. Rarely I execute somone for my animation. And only one outfit looks good. Maybe we can spend gold to increase our RNG chance to be a class we pre select from a list in one or so games.
Example: I spend 100 gold to increase my chance of being a sorcerer on my next game by 3% and it can be stacked by multiplying. You can have a priority list of say three classes or class type and you csn distribute your gold or percentage accordingly.
Maybe we can buy preset deathnotes slots or extra log book pages with the gold.
In game I would likento buy a button that can look at a random persons private logs for like 5k gold.
Maybe we can have a gold betting system while in dead chat to where we bet against each other on who will die or who is evil or inking is good or bad. Make death chat interesting and interactive.

item.description:
Then chances are good that you will leave regardless, unless you get precisely the conditions you want… which is kind of a non-starter convo
If the goal tho is to host a constructive dialogue about how to improve a player’s experience post-execution, it’s a good topic - and I think there are many many diff ways it could be done. I’m p easily entertained myself but I wonder what others would find engaging to keep them in game (?)

item.description:

If you are dead, and your death was announced publicly and correctly, you can leave as the following classes:
1.Neutral King
2.Alchemist
3.Fool
4.Scorned
5.Inquisitor
6.Sorcerer
7.Reaper
8.Possessor
You may leave as the following class only if your contract has died:
1.Mercenary
You may not leave as Blue Dragon.
You may not leave as Cult.
You may not leave as Unseen.
You may not leave if you were defiled.

item.title: Gold after winning and leaving
item.dc:creator: w1ngz
item.description:
Or maybe more incentive to engage socially if we’re stuck in the graveyard for most of a game?
I would guess the % of players who die n1 to random kills and stay through a 12-day game is quite low.
What if players had something to do after death besides argue, like a random doodle pad or some simple minigame where we could win +gold in spite of our team’s loss or victory (sort of like the idea behind the death gambles, but more interactive with one another)? I mean even a tic-tac-toe board would be preferable to thumbs up butts >>
